description.en: The essence of information studies, its object and concepts; its relations to the other disciplines. The development of information studies, main research areas, problems and researchers. Main approaches to information society and the essence of informational infrastructure of society.
description.et: Infoteaduste olemus, uurimisaine, objekt, seosed teiste teadusharudega. Infoteaduste arengulugu, peamised uurimisvaldkonnad, probleemid ja uurijaid. Infoühiskonna peamised käsitlused ning ühiskonna informatsioonilise infrastruktuuri olemus.

objectives.en: Introduction of main knowledge to information studies. To give an overview of the field as a research and practice area. Main concepts, theories and research areas.
objectives.et: Kujundada alusteadmised infoteadustest kui uurimisalast ja praktilisest tegevusvaldkonnast. Põhimõisted, olulisemad teooriad ja uurimissuunad.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course, a student has an overview of the field of information studies; s/he knows its place in relation to the other disciplines. Student knows the terminology, main theories and methodologies of the field; s/he has an overview of the development of information studies, its main research areas, problems, researchers and approaches to information society. Student understands the role of information worker in a society; s/he knows the competency requirements to an information specialist, is familiar to the situation of education on the field and speciality organisations.
